original_text: He said to David, ‘You are a better man than I am. You have been kind to me even when I have tried to hurt you.
korean_text: 다윗에게 이르되 나는 너를 학대하되 너는 나를 선대하니 너는 나보다 의롭도다

sentences.original_text: You are a better man than I am.
You have been kind to me
even when I have tried to hurt you.
